t: Amazon Games expands third-party publishing with an original game from Glowmade - News | Amazon Games
s: September 22, 2021 - Glowmade was founded in 2015 and is based in Guildford, England. This dedicated team of 25 (and counting) are an experienced group of developers, with credits including Fable, Little Big Planet, Battlefield, and Horizon Zero Dawn. Glowmade is currently developing a creative online co-op experience ...

s: September 28, 2021 - Games include standards like chess, checkers, Go Fish, and memory match, and Amazon says you can scale up and down the difficulty level, which could help it accommodate older and younger kids. You can also replace the pieces in some games: dragons, pirates, or dinosaurs instead of checkers, ...

t: Introducing Amazon Glow—A Whole New Way to Bring Families Together for Fun and Learning
s: October 24, 2022 - The first Glow Bits learning kit is the Tangram puzzle game, where kids use physical shapes and their remote family member uses digital shapes to solve challenges together. Tangram Bits is bundled with the purchase of Glow, and additional Glow Bits coming soon will be sold separately.

t: Amazon Games - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - On September 22, 2021, Amazon Games announced it will publish a new title from game developer Glowmade. Based in Guildford, England, Glowmade’s staff includes veterans of Lionhead Studios. This game for Amazon will be a new IP focusing on online cooperative play.
